firstBlock.title: Privacy Policy
texts: Resolution of the Government of the Republic of Kazakhstan No. 1272 of October 8, 2012
According to the calculations of the SRO, the cost of one workplace

On approval of the maximum price of wholesale sale of liquefied petroleum gas on the domestic market In accordance with subparagraph 6. of Article 5 of the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated January 9, 2012 'On Gas and gas supply', the Government of the Republic of Kazakhstan decides:

To approve the maximum price of wholesale sale of liquefied petroleum gas in the domestic market of the Republic of Kazakhstan for the period up to December 31, 2012 in the amount of 35,805 tenge per ton, excluding value added tax.

This resolution shall enter into force upon the expiration of fifteen calendar days after the first official publication.Astana Kazinform-The Government of the Republic of Kazakhstan has approved the maximum price for the wholesale sale of liquefied petroleum gas on the domestic market, official media reports.
Resolution of the Government of the Republic of Kazakhstan No. 1272 of October 8, 2012
According to the calculations of the SRO, the cost of one workplace
